Input utterances: Visit landmarks a, b, and c.
Visit landmarks c, a, and b in any order.
Reach landmarks c and b eventually.
Visit landmark a, then landmark b, then landmark c.
Visit landmark a, then landmark b, and finally landmark c in that order.

Visit landmarks in the following order: a, b, c, d, h. Only visit each landmark once. Do not visit h until you have visited d. Only visit d after you have visited c. Only visit c after you have visited b. Only visit b after you have visited a.
Visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h in that order without revisiting any landmark.
Eventually visit a, then eventually visit b, then eventually visit c, then eventually visit d, and finally visit h. Visit each landmark only once.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in any order.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in any order.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in any order.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in any order.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c.
First, visit a. Then, visit b. Finally, visit c.
Visit landmark a, then landmark b, and finally landmark c in sequence.
Visit a, then visit b after a has been visited, and finally visit c after both a and b have been visited.
Visit landmark a, then visit landmark b, and finally visit landmark c.
Visit landmark a, then visit landmark b, and finally visit landmark c in that order.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in any order.
Visit a, then visit b, then visit c.
Keep visiting landmarks until you have visited landmarks a, b, and c.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in any order.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in order.
Reach landmarks a, b, and c.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in any order.
Locate landmarks a, b, and c.
Visit locations a, b, and c.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in any order.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c.
Eventually, visit landmarks C and B.
Visit landmarks c, a, and b at least once.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c.

Visit landmark a, then landmark b, then landmark c, then landmark d, and finally landmark h. Do not pass through landmarks b, c, d, or h when traveling to a. Do not pass through landmarks c, d, or h when traveling to b. Do not pass through landmarks d or h when traveling to c. Do not pass through landmark h when traveling to d. You cannot revisit any landmark.
Visit landmarks in the following order: a, b, c, d, h. Do not revisit any landmark. Only visit h after visiting d, visit d after visiting c, visit c after visiting b, and visit b after visiting a.
Visit landmark a, then visit landmark b, then visit landmark c, then visit landmark d, and finally visit landmark h. Do not revisit any previously visited landmarks while traveling to the next one.

First, go to landmark a without visiting landmarks b, c, d, or h. Then, go to landmark b without visiting landmarks c, d, or h, or revisiting landmark a. Alternatively, revisit landmark a before going to landmark c without visiting landmarks d or h, or revisiting landmarks a or b. After that, go to landmark d without visiting landmark h or revisiting landmarks a, b, or c. Finally, go to landmark h without revisiting landmarks a, b, c, or d.
Visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h in sequence without skipping any of them. Do not revisit any landmark after you have already visited it.
Always visit a, b, c, d, and h.
Always visit a, b, c, d, and h in any order infinitely many times.
Always visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h without interruption.
Always visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h.
Always visit a, b, c, d, and h in any order.
Visit landmark a, then landmark b, then landmark c.
Visit landmark a, then landmark b, then landmark c.
Visit landmark a, then visit landmark b, and finally visit landmark c.
Visit landmark a, then landmark b, and finally landmark c.
Always visit landmarks a, b, and c.

First, visit landmark a exactly once. Then, at some point in time, visit landmark b exactly once. After that, visit landmark c exactly once in the future. Finally, visit landmark d exactly once, followed by a visit to landmark h.

Visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h exactly once each. Do not visit b unless you have already visited a. Do not visit c unless you have already visited b. Do not visit d unless you have already visited c. Do not visit h unless you have already visited d.
Visit landmark a, then visit landmark b, then visit landmark c, then visit landmark d, and finally visit landmark h. Make sure to visit each landmark exactly once and follow this exact order.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in any order.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in any order.
Visit landmarks a, b, and c in any order.
Always visit h, then d, then c, then b, and finally a.
Always visit b, then c, then a, then d, and finally h. Repeat this sequence infinitely.
Visit landmarks a, d, c, h, and b repeatedly in an infinite loop.
Always visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h repeatedly.
Visit d, then h, then b, then c, and finally a.
First, visit landmark a. Then, visit landmark b. Finally, visit landmark c.
Move to a, then move to b, then move to c.
Visit a, then visit b, then reach c.
First, visit landmark a. Then, visit landmark b. Finally, reach landmark c.
Move to a, then move to b, and finally reach c.
Always visit c, a, d, h, and b repeatedly.
Visit landmarks a, b, h, d, and c repeatedly without any restrictions.
You must always go to landmarks d, c, h, b, and a.
You must continuously visit landmarks c, a, h, b, and d.
You must always explore landmarks a, b, c, d, and h.
Always visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h. Order of visitation does not matter.
Visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h in any order.
Always visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h in any order repeatedly.
Continuously visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h in any order.
Always visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h in any order.
Visit landmark A, then landmark B, then landmark C, then landmark D, and finally landmark H. Do not revisit any of the landmarks before completing the task.

Visit landmark A, then visit landmark B without revisiting A before. After visiting B, visit landmark C without revisiting A or B before. After visiting C, visit landmark D without revisiting A, B, or C before. Finally, after visiting D, visit landmark H without revisiting A, B, C, or D before.

First, visit landmark A only once. Then, visit landmark B only once. After that, visit landmark C only once. Once you have visited C, visit landmark D only once. Finally, visit landmark H, but only after you have visited D.

Visit landmark a, then visit landmark b without revisiting a. After that, visit landmark c without revisiting b. Then, visit landmark d without revisiting c. Finally, visit landmark h without revisiting d.
Visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h in the exact order given. You cannot revisit any location once you leave it.

First, visit landmark a and never visit it again. Then, visit landmark b before visiting landmarks c, d, and h, and never visit b again. Do not visit d or h until you have visited c, and never visit c again. Next, visit d before visiting h, and never visit d or h again. Finally, visit landmark h.
First, visit landmark a. Then, visit landmark b. Finally, visit landmark c.
First, go to landmark a. Then, visit landmark b. Finally, reach landmark c.
First, go to landmark A. Then, go to landmark B. After that, go to landmark C.
Visit b after visiting a and visit c after visiting b.
First, reach a. Then, reach b. Finally, reach c.
Always visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h repeatedly.
Always visit a, b, c, d, and h.
Always visit landmarks a, b, c, d, and h.
Always visit a, b, c, d, and h repeatedly.
Visit landmark a, then landmark b, then landmark c, then landmark d, and finally landmark h. You can only visit each landmark once and must follow this specific order.
Visit a while avoiding b. Then, visit b while avoiding c. After that, visit c while avoiding d. Next, visit d while avoiding h. Finally, visit h. Make sure to visit each location only once.
Visit landmark A once, then landmark B once without visiting C, then landmark C once without visiting D, then landmark D once without visiting H, and finally visit landmark H.
Visit landmarks in sequence while staying away from the next landmark until reaching the final landmark without revisiting any previous landmarks.

First, go directly to landmark A without stopping at landmark B. Then, proceed directly to landmark B without stopping at landmark C. Next, proceed directly to landmark C without stopping at landmark D. After that, proceed directly to landmark D without stopping at landmark H. Finally, proceed directly to landmark H and visit landmarks A, B, C, and D only once.
Visit a, then visit b, then visit c.
Visit landmark a, then visit landmark b, and finally visit landmark c.
First, reach a. Then, reach b. Finally, reach c.
Visit a, then go to b, and finally make your way to c.
First, visit landmark a. Then, proceed to landmark b. Finally, visit landmark c.
Output LTLs: F(a & F(b & Fc)) & G(!b U a) & G(!c U (a & Fb))
(!b U a) & (!c U b) & (!d U c) & (!h U d) & Fh & (!a U (a U (!a U b))) & (!b U (b U (!b U c))) & (!c U (c U (!c U d))) & (!d U (d U (!d U h)))
F(a & F(b & F(c & F(d & Fh)))) & (!b U a) & (!c U b) & (!d U c) & (!h U d)
This statement alone cannot be translated into LTL as it is not a temporal statement. LTL is used to express temporal properties of a system, so it requires a temporal context to be meaningful.
(!b U a) & (!c U b) & (!d U c) & (!h U d) & (!a U (a U (!a U b))) & (!b U (b U (!b U c))) & (!c U (c U (!c U d))) & (!d U Fh) & G(!(a & b & c & d & h))
(!b U a) & (!c U b) & (!d U c) & (!h U d) & Fh & (!a U (a U (!a U b))) & (!b U (b U (!b U c))) & (!c U (c U (!c U d))) & (!d U (d U (!d U h)))
(!b U a) & (!c U b) & (!d U c) & (!h U d) & G(!(b | c | d | h) U (a & !b)) & G(!(a | c | d | h) U (b & !c)) & G(!(a | b | d | h) U (c & !d)) & G(!(a | b | c | d) U h)

(!b U a) & (!c U b) & (!d U b) & (!h U b) & (!a U (!b U (!c U (!d U (!h U b)))) & ((!b U (!c U (!d U (!h U c)))) | ((!a U (!c U (!d U (!h U c)))) & (!b U a)) & ((!c U (!d U (!h U d)))) | ((!a U (!b U (!c U (!h U d)))) & (!d U a)) & (!h U d) & GFh

G((b & Fc & Fa & Fd & Fh) & (c & Fa & Fd & Fh & Fb) & (a & Fd & Fh & Fb & Fc) & (d & Fh & Fb & Fc & Fa) & (h & Fb & Fc & Fa & Fd))
G((c & a & h & b & d) & (Fa & Fb & Fc & Fh & Fd))

This can be expressed as a conjunction of LTL formulas, one for each pair of consecutive landmarks. For example, if the sequence is a, b, c, and d, the formula would be:
(!b U a) & (!c U b) & (!d U c) & (!h U d) & Fh & (!a U (a U (!a U b))) & (!b U (b U (!b U c))) & (!c U (c U (!c U d))) & (!d U (d U (!d U h))) & (!h U (a & b & c & d))
